thoughts.text: Now that I know where I am, I should list the files in the current working directory.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in the current working directory will give me an idea of what files are available to me and what I can work with.
thoughts.plan: - List the files in the current working directory using the 'list_files' command with the argument 'directory': '.'.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to get too caught up in exploring the files in the directory and lose sight of my overall goals.
thoughts.speak: I will now list the files in the current working directory to see what files are available to me.
